title.value: Australian Digital Health Agency National Cancer Screening Program Participation CompositionValueSet

description.value: The purpose of this profile is to define a representation of a National Cancer Screening Program Participation document that describes a individual's participation in one or more national cancer screening programs at a point in time for the electronic exchange of health information between individuals, healthcare providers, and the My Health Record system infrastructure in Australia. A composition is a set of resources composed into a single coherent clinical statement that may have clinical attestation. This profile elaborates the section type value set member options to support design activities.

copyright.value: Copyright Â© 2022 Australian Digital Health Agency - All rights reserved. This content is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. See https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.

definition.value: A document that describes a individual's participation in one or more national cancer screening programs, e.g. bowel or cervical. Participation information may include information on an individual's eligibility for a program, suspension of participation in a program, or status of participation in a program.

human.value: One record type (category) shall be Disease Screening Program Participation Record '100.32039' 'https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/CodeSystem/nctis-data-components-1'

short.value: National cancer screening program participation record

definition.value: Information of an individual's participation in national cancer screening program.

short.value: National cancer screening program participation observation

definition.value: Information related to an individual's participation in one or more health programs such as a weight management program or a national cancer screening program.
Information related to an individual's participation in one or more disease screening programs such as a national cancer screening program.

short.value: National cervical cancer screening program participation information

definition.value: A record of an individual's participation in a national cervical cancer screening program. Participation information may include information on an individual's eligibility for a program, suspension of participation in a program, or status of participation in a program.

short.value: National bowel cancer screening program participation information

definition.value: A record of an individual's participation in a national bowel cancer screening program. Participation information may include information on an individual's eligibility for a program, suspension of participation in a program, or status of participation in a program.
